#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>

using namespace std;

int main(){
    int t,cnt=0,temp,i=0;
    string s;
    cin>>t;
    for(;t>0;t--){
        cin>>s;
        temp=s.length();
        for(i=0;i<temp;i++){
            if(s[i]=='A' || s[i]=='D' || s[i]=='O' || s[i]=='P' || s[i]=='Q' || s[i]=='R'){
                cnt+=1;
            }
            else if(s[i]=='B')
                cnt+=2;
        }
        cout<<cnt<<"\n";
        cnt=0;
    }
    return 0;
}
